abstract: Sloane Crosley observes that female authors easily create multilayered stories by presenting physical danger without making it the main event.
lead_paragraph: Female writers don’t need to destroy the world in order to imagine feeling unsafe in it.

headline.main: It’s the End of the World as She Knows It
headline.print_headline: It’s the End of the World as She Knows It

snippet: Female writers don’t need to destroy the world in order to imagine feeling unsafe in it.
